top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave
I still think Nonpoint has the greatest cover of this song but you guys did a unique, creepy and completely awesome take on it. Good job!
That Chucky is a lucky bastard
Could you do a cover of Russian roulette by rihanna but with your take on it please? That would be out of this world! 😊

comments_since_last_sample.body: Adoro a Violet como atriz mto bom. Phil Collins é uma lenda. Very good.
This is a masterpiece of a cover.  I hope to hear more originals from you and your soul story.
Very interesting and unique spin on the song.  Loved it.  You guys did a great job on this video.
Wow you guys did an amazing job with this one.  Literally got chills.
Could you do a cover of Russian roulette by rihanna but with your take on it please? That would be out of this world! 😊
As someone that loved the original- awesome job!
Trigger warnings trigger me, please be more considerate going foreword.

There are many talented ladies doing music and you are on the top of the list. You are both beautiful and very talented in doing the music you do. I try to watch all your content as much as I can. Keep Rocking and doing you. By the way thirsty DM's!!!! Wow some men are way to desperate. Again thanks for the music. Brian

your videos get more and more twisted... i love it!! Though i would have loved for you to include the epic drum beat that this song is known for. other than that what a fantastic cover! very well done!.
As a huge fan of Phil Collins's original I am completely blown away by this cover.  You OWNED it!
I hope Violet and Chucky are happy together.
I liked it but really missed the drum section 😢  for me it's what made the song so good
I still think Nonpoint has the greatest cover of this song but you guys did a unique, creepy and completely awesome take on it. Good job!
That Chucky is a lucky bastard
